name: exchange_rate
description: Retrieves exchange rates using Norges Bank's API. Returns rate information including the base currency, target currency, date, and conversion rate.

baseCurrency.description: The base currency code (e.g., NOK, USD)

targetCurrency.description: The target currency code (e.g., EUR, USD)

date.description: Optional date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to latest available rate.
